name: Splitmo - Puzzle Game (Browser)
description: Splitmo is a casual strategy game about duplicating. You have to click or tap on the dots to copy them to all adjacent cells. Get each colored dot in its corresponding goal to win! On a computer or laptop, press the "E" key to go to the level editor. Here, you can export, import, and play custom levels! Post your level code in the comments below for others to try out. There are 60 levels. Each level gets more difficult. Can you finish them all?
